title: The Argument of the Lord Chief Justice of the Court of King's Bench concerning the great case of monopolies, between the East-India Company, plantiff, and Thomas Sandys, defendant wherein their patent for trading to the East-Indies, exclusive of all others, is adjudged good.
author: Jeffreys, George Jeffreys, Baron, 1644 or 5-1689.
publisher: Printed, and are sold by Randal Taylor ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
